text: DIGI Hungary was the fourth-largest telecom provider in Hungary. It was founded in 1994 as a subsidiary of DIGI Group, led by Zoltán Teszári. On December 31, 2024, DIGI merged with Vodafone to create One Hungary. ==References== Category:1994 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Hungary Category:2024 disestablishments in Europe Category:Technology companies of Europe Category:Mobile phone companies Category:Companies of Hungary Category:Organizations based in Budapest
title: DIGI Hungary
